Posts.Content: My mother has been prescribed a second line treatment with caelyx (Doxil). They didn't add any other drug, but I have heard positive things about Avastin. Is it alredy a standard treatment or is it still on a trial for ovarian cancer?  Have you started the treatment at the end or are you doing some other one? all the best to you
Posts.Title: Avastin & Doxil

Posts.Content: Der princie, thanks for your reply. i sow on the avastin site that the full name is bevacizumab..I have heard this name more often, i need to check on my info what  did it say about ovarian cancer. Next week we have an appointment with a doctor who can update us will all chemo trials available at the moment. I am not sure what to ask for, I suppose she will give us a few options. I will ask her about avastin as well. so, all the best and strenght to you, let me know how you are doing
Posts.Title: Avastin & Doxil

Posts.Content: Hi, doxil should be another name of Caelyx   rgds Lara
Posts.Title: Avastin & Doxil
